1.content: Research KCT Knowledge API structure and capabilities
1.details:
1. Explore API endpoints at kct-knowledge-api-2-production.up.railway.app
2. Document available endpoints and data structure
3. Test API authentication with provided key
4. Identify analytics-relevant endpoints (sales data, customer insights, AI analysis results)

2.details:
1. Plan data flow between Supabase (products, orders) and KCT Knowledge API
2. Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) to display
3. Design dashboard layout with multiple data source integration
4. Plan real-time data synchronization strategy

3.details:
1. Create comprehensive dashboard integrating Supabase + KCT Knowledge API
2. Add AI-powered customer insights (psychology, segmentation, behavior)
3. Implement sales optimization analytics and predictive insights
4. Include chatbot performance analytics and conversation patterns
5. Add smart bundle analytics and recommendation performance
6. Integrate customer journey mapping with psychological analysis
7. Create predictive analytics views (churn, LTV, purchase probability)
8. Add real-time voice analytics integration with ElevenLabs
9. Implement seasonal trends and market intelligence
10. Mobile-responsive luxury admin interface

4.content: Deploy and test integrated analytics system
4.details:
1. Deploy final dashboard with all integrations
2. Test data flow from both sources
3. Verify real-time updates and performance
4. Ensure mobile responsiveness for admin use
